https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/dHCDjJCGwysO3OB5wtG6VbL5SD0.jpg Set in a provincial city that has been quarantined to prevent the spread of infection after a zombie outbreak, this human drama depicts the new daily life of a high school girl who remains in the quarantine area to take care of her family who have become zombies. (machine translation) Dead or Zombie
